node.title: Teens behind 'horrendous' killing of 14 kangaroos weep in court
node.alt: A deserted beach on a grey day.
node.description: The magistrate said the boys, both 17, carried out the act "without any real rationale other than a brain explosion".
node.content:
["Two teenage boys have pleaded guilty to deliberately killing 14 kangaroos on the New South Wales Far South Coast.", "The two 17-year-olds were arrested last month after police found the dead kangaroos and joeys in the Long Beach and Maloneys Beach areas, north of Batemans Bay, on October 9.", "The pair appeared in Batemans Bay Children's Court today, accompanied by their parents and wiping away tears as Magistrate David Williams handed down the sentence.", "\"This was horrendous,\" he said.", "", "
The bodies of some of the kangaroos the boys killed were found in the Maloneys Beach area.(ABC South East NSW: Adriane Reardon)
", "
'Racked with guilt'
", "Magistrate Williams told the court\u00a0the boys deliberately drove their vehicles into the animals \"without any real rationale other than a brain explosion\".", "Both boys each faced one count of\u00a0recklessly beating and killing animals, a crime that carries a maximum penalty of three years in jail.", "But their lack of criminal history and remorse was considered.", "\"This offending was completely out of character,\" Magistrate Williams said.", "\"They are racked with guilt and remorse, and that's appropriate.", "
'Talk it out'
", "The two boys were ordered to participate in\u00a0a\u00a0youth justice conference as part of their sentence.", "It will require them to meet with different parties involved\u00a0to discuss the harm they\u00a0caused.", "They will not be required to reappear in court.", "Magistrate Williams said the conference\u00a0could include\u00a0police officers and that he would recommend\u00a0that wildlife carers attend.", "\"You sit down in a room and you talk it out,\" he said.", "\"It's not to rub your nose in it \u2026 it's to put you in someone else's shoes \u2026 and see things from another perspective.\"", "", "
Hope was the only survivor.(Supplied: WIRES)
", "
Hope on the mend
", "The sole surviving joey found in the Maloneys Beach area is named Hope and\u00a0remains in the care of WIRES volunteers.", "\"She's obviously got a bit of anxiety, but she's in good hands,\" Mid South Coast WIRES chair\u00a0Janelle Renes said.", "Ms Renes said she and other WIRES volunteers involved in the rescue and the disposal of the bodies would be open to\u00a0meeting the two boys.", "\"I'm pleased that they are remorseful,\" Ms Renes said.", "\"It's still hard for us to understand why the event happened.", "\"It's just inconceivable \u2026 we would be very interested in having a conversation with them.\""]
